note: Formal education is [primary](#dod:primary-education) or higher. Regional estimates are population-weighted averages. Data for the years before 2015 are estimates, while data from 2015 onwards are projections.
title: Population having attained at least some formal education
subtitle: Based on the population aged 15 years and older.
sourceDesc: Our World in Data based on Barro and Lee (2015) and Lee and Lee (2016)
